name: Move safely
goal: Travel to coordinates or targets while avoiding hazards and keeping awareness up
environment: Watch for lava, ravines, water currents, and mobs in the snapshot
Prefer lit or open routes; avoid dense foliage at night

steps.title: Evaluate route
steps.details: Use current surroundings and goal to mark hazards, nearby blocks, and entities. Share the hazard list with the planner before moving.
checks: Path avoids lava and steep drops

steps.title: Prepare defenses
steps.details: Equip shield/armor/food if available. Keep blocks ready for quick walls or bridging.

steps.title: Traverse with waypoints
steps.details: Walk in short segments, stopping to rescan after each move. Bridge gaps with any solid blocks; pillar or dig detours if mobs block the path.

notes: Never sprint blind over unknown terrain. Carry torches to reduce mob spawns on future trips.
